Decertify.definition: to withdraw or revoke the certification of [ decertified the class action suit] ;esp

-fyÂ·ing.definition: to withdraw or revoke the certification of [the class action suit]to withdraw the certification of (a labor union) as a collective bargaining agent [petitions to the union]
-fyÂ·ing.note: The National Labor Relations Board will decertify a union after an election in which the majority of members do not support the union or after participation in an illegal strike.
